document.full_text: singer jermaine jackson is detailing the life of his famous family and late brother michael jackson in a memoir that its publisher promises gives a close look at the complex life of the king of pop.
document.title: jermaine jackson to pen memoir on brother michael
lines_and_colors: singer jermaine jackson is detailing the life of his famous family and late brother michael jackson in a memoir that its publisher promises gives a close look at the complex life of the king of pop.
